'''''Bloomsbury Auctions: Manuscripts & Autograph Letters, Continental & English Literature and History, and Modern First Editions, 15th June 2006''''' is an auction catalogue from Bloomsbury Auctions. The description for Lot 715 (p. 137) includes extracts from a three page [[letter to Michael Blashka]] (not dated, but c.1960s) - sent to [[Joy Hill]] for typing along with a single page note to Joy about the letter and addressee. The first page of the letter is reproduced in a photograph.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net]</ref>
